full_title: KAKSS Neoprene Dumbbells Set, 1.5kg Pair (2 x 1.5kg) Pink Hex Dumbbells with Anti-Slip Coated Grip, Hand Weights for Women, Exercise Weights for Home Gym Weights and Fitness Training, Proudly Made in India

reasoning.keyword_integration: Prioritized high-volume roots like "weights dumbbells set", "dumbbells set women", "dumbbell set", "hand weights for women", "gym weights", "exercise weights" and "hex dumbbell" by embedding them as natural descriptive phrases: "Neoprene Dumbbells Set", "1.5kg Pair", "Pink Hex Dumbbells", "Hand Weights for Women", "Exercise Weights for Home Gym Weights". Maintained all verified facts (brand, neoprene-coated metal, 1.5kg each, pair, pink, hex design, anti-slip grip, made in India) and connected use cases with "for" to mirror search intent around home gym and fitness training while keeping the title readable and product-accurate.
